mapper.sql: SELECT NUM , CRS_CD , AGENT_PK , SEQ , COURSE_AGENT_PK , CLASS_AGENT_PK , FULL_SCORE , START_DT , END_DT , CHANGE_STATE , REG_DATE , TRACSE_TME , CRS_YEAR , CRS_TERM , SYNC_STATUS , SYNC_RESULT_MSG , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM FROM tb_hrd_crs_cre_crs
mapper.select:
SELECT NUM , CRS_CD , AGENT_PK , @row_num := @row_num + 1 AS SEQ , COURSE_AGENT_PK , CLASS_AGENT_PK , FULL_SCORE , START_DT , END_DT , CHANGE_STATE , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DATE , TRACSE_TME FROM tb_hrd_crs_cre_crs, (select @row_num := 0) as B
ORDER BY MOD_DTTM ASC
/* SQL ID : countApiStatus 설 명 : 기수별 수강 전송 데이터 전체 카운트 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_hrd_crs_cre_crs

SELECT A.CRS_CD AS CRS_CD , A.SBJ_CD AS COURSE_AGENT_PK , A.CRS_CRE_CD AS CLASS_AGENT_PK , 100 as FULL_SCORE , LEFT(B.ENRL_START_DTTM,8) AS START_DT , LEFT(B.ENRL_END_DTTM,8) AS END_DT , NOW() AS REG_DATE , A.TRACSE_TME AS TRACSE_TME , B.CRS_YEAR AS CRS_YEAR , B.CRS_TERM AS CRS_TERM FROM tb_crs_cre_crs A, tb_crs_crs B WHERE A.CRS_CD = B.CRS_CD AND A.CRS_CD = #{crsCd}
AND A.CRS_CRE_CD =#{crsCreCd}
